page.title: 20Living in Yeovil in 1985.
page.content: I enjoy living in Yeovil very much. I have plenty of space to play & walk my dog,& with the various theatres, cinemas & the town Football club,there is usually something going on. There are lots of clubs in Yeovil too,like the Olympiads (athletics), Majorettes,Roller Skating,the Music Club,Boys Brigade,Judo,etc. For grown-ups there are Wine Making, Singing,Writing,Model Engineering,Car, Bridge,Cage Birds,Photographic,Floral Arranging,C.B.Radio & Stamp Clubs. Our side of town is a bit noisy some- times when helicopters are flying,but Yeovil is a good place to live. { { Groups compiling this Domesday Data. Huish School pupils,parents & staff. Park School pupils & staff. Holy Trinity pupils & staff.
